headline: Allegion Declares Quarterly Dividend
summary: DUBLIN, December 05, 2024--Allegion plc (NYSE: ALLE), a leading global security products and solutions provider, today announced that its board of directors declared a quarterly dividend of $0.48 per ordinary share of the company.

headline: Allegion : Appoints Gregg Sengstack to Board of Directors Form 8 K
summary: Allegion plc , a leading global security products and solutions provider, has appointed Gregg Sengstack, executive chairperson of Franklin Electric Company, Inc., to the Allegion Board of Directors ....
